org.jepria.oauth.sdk.token

Class VerifierRSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jepria.oauth.sdk.token.VerifierBase
      • org.jepria.oauth.sdk.token.VerifierRSA
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Verifier

    public class VerifierRSA
extends VerifierBase
    Verifier for RSA signed JWS tokens. Checks signature validity by public key.
